title: US National Pro Road Championships: Faulkner Shows New Sprinting Prowess to Retain Her Title
content:
Olympic champion Kristen Faulkner beats Stephens and Sarkisov in three-up sprint to the line in Charleston.

Read the full article at US National Pro Road Championships: Faulkner Shows New Sprinting Prowess to Retain Her Title on Velo.
author: sstokes
